title: red sea (as above, so below)
content:
333 whales on the beach
bleed the sand pink like salt,
salt and meat, salt in water.
Any bleached coral convalescence
only a blood stained illusion.
Sharks blind in blood stained
waters, just salt and meat in oil.
Salt and oil, salt in water.
Red Sea war for blood and oil,
our MENA conflict aquarium, 
Atlantic Museum for oil and blood.
Blood type A, AB, O, pos or neg,
HIV pos blood meat ocean carved up
to infinity to feed the 5000.
